Text: grrr now i have to find the ntsc version (nothing against pal) I just can't play it on my DVD player
phxcityslick use dvd info edit and you can make from a pal dvd a ntsc dvd!

The NrrW release doesn't have any English subs, so the torrent info is wrong.

If you want English subs, you must grab the NTSC retail release, Memoirs.Of.A.Geisha.PROPER.DVDR-MPTDVD.

An NTSC-version (dvd9) is available here (under the wrong category - Video) : http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3464715

If this one does not start uploading soon I'll go for that one
